name: Welcome to a structured life.
description: Are you tired of feeling overwhelmed and disorganized in your personal and professional life? Notion is a powerful tool that can help you streamline your life and get everything in order. With this template, you can structure your life in a way that makes sense and keeps you on track.A little about myself: I'm Daniel dutch, but I happened to grow up in China (真的). I started as a freelancer at the age of 16 and slowly drifted into SaaS, which is what I'm still doing today (going quite well, I'd s
features: Explanation video by me; Introducing the template; The brain dump method; Daily habits; Note taking system
